reviews.review: Completely lives up to the hype. A true Empire Strikes Back movie scenario.
Too long and too much “galaxy”. The fun part about super hero movies is that they take place in the human reality. This movie takes the action way into outer space. It’s too much like Star Wars.

It was a really great, super action-packed and really entertaining Marvel live-action science fiction fantasy adventure. It had really awe-inspiring special effects, really great characters, lots of great humor, really awesome action, really exciting adventure, really superb cast, really awesome music, really great cinematography, really well done costumes, really great makeup and a really cool storyline. In my opinion, I think it’s the best Avengers movie of the year. I’ll have to see what’s happening in the fourth part of “The Avengers” next year. I really recommend this movie to old and new Marvel fans of all ages.
Love love love it! Complete movie despite everything goin on.
It was intense. Josh Brolin could have done a better job with Thanos' personality.
What A Movie. The Best superhero movie EVER.  And one of the best movies of All Time great plot, great use of characters, good comedy, great villain.

I love the characters of the Marvel Universe. I enjoyed the first part of this movie. There were many small battles involving a few heroes each time. The character Thanos was greatly expanded. The second part of this movie was almost boring. Just like the other two Avengers movies, the climactic battle relies on countless hordes of generic enemies attacking the heroes. And just like the other two movies, the generic hordes all die when a hero flips a switch (this time it's Thor). This is lazy script writing and I'm tired of it. I'm hoping the second part of Infinty War does not use this lazy plot device. The ending of this movie leaves much to be desired. The ending is full of death and despair. I understand the second movie will be happier. This reminds me of the disaster known as The Last Jedi.
very good movie blending everyone together.

Seeing all the characters and superheroes from different stories fighting together for the same cause was the highlight for me; especially the characters from Guardians of the Galaxy and Black Panther. Only down side is that if you aren't familiar with the back story of the subplots (and there are many) and characters, it would be hard to fully follow along.
